original_text: This shows that God has not chosen them because of any good things that they have done. If that was true, we could not say that God was really being kind to them. It would not be his gift.
korean_text: 만일 은혜로 된 것이면 행위로 말미암지 않음이니 그렇지 않으면 은혜가 은혜 되지 못하느니라

sentences.original_text: This shows that God has not chosen them
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 하나님이 그들을 선택하지 않았다는 것을 보여줍니다

sentences.original_text: because of any good things that they have done
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 행한 어떤 좋은 일들 때문이 아니라

sentences.original_text: we could not say that God was really being kind to them
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 하나님이 그들에게 정말로 친절하다고 말할 수 없을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: It would not be his gift
